item.description: Depending on weather you may want to bring ice cleats or snowshoes. A great local spot with trails, a meadow, stream, and links to the Robert Frost trail. Popular year-round. Plan for about an hour and a half, maybe longer. Let's hope for favorable weather!
item.how_to_find_us: I have a black lab w/blue leash, & vanilla PT Cruiser

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!
